name: It's Following Me Time to Run
name_original: It's Following Me Time to Run
description: My son's entry for cbjam 2022. I was going to participate in the game jam with him, but then life happened and came at us sideways, so he made this himself with Godot and a few tutorials. I only helped him with the exporting to HTML5 and checking a few errors during development. He's super proud of his achievement in two days. Good job kid. Way to sling some code.
